column4: i'm curious, if you have 10.10 & 10.04 servers, you probably can't upgrade can you? something would surely break i suspect.  so you would have no choice but to rebuild and start from scratch?  is there a migration option?
I've upgraded 10.04 and 1.10 servers to 12.04 a few times,
some things could break, but it depends on what you're running
